description: Updates a Voice Connector's emergency calling configuration.

parameters.name: EmergencyCallingConfiguration
parameters.description: The configuration being updated. DNIS (list) --- The Dialed Number Identification Service (DNIS) emergency calling configuration details. (dict) --- The Dialed Number Identification Service (DNIS) emergency calling configuration details associated with an Amazon Chime SDK Voice Connector's emergency calling configuration. The DNIS phone number that you route emergency calls to, in E.164 format. TestPhoneNumber (string) --- The DNIS phone number for routing test emergency calls to, in E.164 format. The country from which emergency calls are allowed, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

nested_params.name: DNIS
nested_params.description: The Dialed Number Identification Service (DNIS) emergency calling configuration details.

nested_params.name: EmergencyPhoneNumber
nested_params.description: The DNIS phone number that you route emergency calls to, in E.164 format.

nested_params.name: TestPhoneNumber
nested_params.description: The DNIS phone number for routing test emergency calls to, in E.164 format.

nested_params.name: CallingCountry
nested_params.description: The country from which emergency calls are allowed, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.
